long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Developer tool for redirecting HTTP requests in Google Chrome, with a clean, simple UI.

Specify a URL (or part of a URL) to search for, and what to replace it with, and Switchyroo will automatically redirect the browser's web traffic.

Use it for debugging production sites - load a local copy of the remote code.

 - Redirects URLs
 - Shows which redirect URLs were executed after opening
 - Clean, simple UI in a popup
